summary.span: 表示一个代码组，该代码组的策略声明是当前代码组的策略声明和所有其匹配的子代码组策略声明的联合。

span.span: Represents a code group whose policy statement is the union of the current code group's policy statement and the policy statement of all its matching child code groups.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是代码访问安全性策略的构建基块。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别包含可以有子代码组 （依此类推），从而形成一个树的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups (and so on), forming a tree. 每个代码组有一个确定是否给定的程序集它是否属于，基于该程序集的证据的成员资格条件。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it or not, based on the evidence for that assembly. 其成员资格条件匹配给定的程序集的唯一代码组和它们的子代码组应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 是最常见的一种代码组。所有匹配的子代码组的策略语句 (以及通过扩展其子代码组) 与匹配的父代码组的权限集组合在一起。 is the most common type of code group; the policy statement of all matching child code groups (and by extension their child code groups) are combined with the permission set of the matching parent code group. 因此，如果其成员资格条件匹配，此代码组构成其策略声明的联合和所有也匹配该证据及其子代码组。Thus, if its membership condition matches, this code group forms the union of its policy statement and those of all its child code groups that also match the evidence. 代码组是由 CASPOL 实用程序创建的代码组 (请参阅[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。 code groups are the code groups created by the CASPOL utility (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定要加载程序集的证据，则此方法通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件计算的代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的代码组，其中包括的子代码组评估的策略语句。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 对于联合代码组，还解析其成员资格条件匹配的证据的所有子代码组，和所有生成的策略语句窗体具有父级联合代码组的策略语句的联合。For union code groups, all child code groups whose membership condition match the evidence are also resolved, and all resulting policy statements form a union with the policy statement of the parent union code group. 每个子代码组类型确定如何应用及其子组，具体取决于如何各自方法的工作原理。Each child code group type determines how its child groups are applied, depending on how their respective methods work. .NET Framework 安全系统使用上的策略级别以确定要从生成的策略声明和代码为加载代码授予哪些权限请求的程序集。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 如果成员资格条件与指定的证据不匹配，此方法返回`null`; 否则为它将设置要返回的权限 (P) 设置为等于代码组的策略语句，然后继续。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, this method returns `null`; otherwise, it sets the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement, and then continues. 对于每个子代码组，方法会代码组解析与相同的证据;如果结果不为`null`，它将设置 P 等于兼具 P 和子代码组的策略语句。For each child code group, the method resolves the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, it sets P equal to the union of P and the child code group's policy statement. 然后，它返回 P，现在是当前代码组的策略语句和所有子组策略语句的并集。It then returns P, which is now the union of the current code group's policy statement and all child group policy statements.
